name: Barar Trust
description: BARAR TRUST is a public charitable trust established to provide sound education, computer education, vocational training, and social justice programs for marginalized communities, especially SC, ST, BC, OBC, minorities, children, women, the elderly, and people with disabilities. It aims to establish technical schools, hospitals, and media outlets for the benefit of students and the general public.
mission: To empower and uplift marginalized communities through education, skill development, and social justice initiatives.
vision: To change the lives of under privilege communities through upliftment, education and skill development
founder_description: He is the founder and chairman of BARAR TRUST, dedicated to establishing a trust for public charitable purposes.
